get.summary: Simple helper endpoint to get all enum values for UI dropdowns.
GetRegion returns the region details for the given region for LoRaWAN.

platformAggregationType.description:
Aggregation type for time-series data.

 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_NONE: No aggregation (raw data).
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_AVG: Average values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_MIN: Minimum values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_MAX: Maximum values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_SUM: Sum of values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_COUNT: Count of data points.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_FIRST: First value in time window.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_LAST: Last value in time window.

platformAssetType.description:
- ASSET_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown asset type.
 - ASSET_TYPE_WATER_METER: AMR Water meter Inductive.
 - ASSET_TYPE_ENERGY_METER: Energy Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GAS_METER: GAS Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GPS_TRACKER: GPS Tracker device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device.

platformConnectionCategory.description:
- CONNECTION_CATEGORY_UNKNOWN: Unknown connection category.
 - CONNECTION_CATEGORY_DOMESTIC: Domestic connection category.
 - CONNECTION_CATEGORY_COMMERCIAL: Commercial connection category.
 - CONNECTION_CATEGORY_INDUSTRIAL: Industrial connection category.

platformConnectionLevel.description:
- CONNECTION_LEVEL_UNKNOWN: Unknown level.
 - CONNECTION_LEVEL_SUPPLY: Water entering the system (dam, borewell, treatment plant).
 - CONNECTION_LEVEL_DISTRIBUTION: Intermediate bulk / zone / DMA meter.
 - CONNECTION_LEVEL_CONSUMPTION: End consumer meter (house, commercial, industrial).

platformConnectionStatus.description:
- CONNECTION_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Unknown connection status.
 - CONNECTION_STATUS_ACTIVE: Active connection.
 - CONNECTION_STATUS_DISCONNECTED: Disconnected connection.
 - CONNECTION_STATUS_DISABLED: Disabled connection.

platformConnectionType.description:
- CONNECTION_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown connection type.
 - CONNECTION_TYPE_WATER: Water connection.
 - CONNECTION_TYPE_GAS: Gas connection.
 - CONNECTION_TYPE_ELECTRICITY: Electricity connection.

platformConsumerStatus.description:
- CONSUMER_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Unknown consumer status.
 - CONSUMER_STATUS_ACTIVE: Active consumer.
 - CONSUMER_STATUS_INACTIVE: Inactive consumer.
 - CONSUMER_STATUS_TERMINATED: Terminated consumer.

platformDeviceType.description:
Communication mode enumeration - unified for inventory and other services.

 - DEVICE_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_DEVICE: LoRaWAN device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM: Cellular MQTT device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_LTE: Cellular TCP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM_LTE: Cellular UDP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY: LoRaWAN Gateway device type.

platformDownlinkMode.description:
Downlink delivery mode enumeration.

 - DOWNLINK_MODE_IMMEDIATE: Immediate downlink (for always-on devices).
 - DOWNLINK_MODE_QUEUED: Queued downlink (for battery-powered devices, sent on next uplink).
 - DOWNLINK_MODE_SCHEDULED: Scheduled downlink (sent at specific time).

platformFieldType.description:
Field type enumeration for data aggregation.
Determines how aggregation functions should be applied to different field types.

 - FIELD_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown field type - defaults to VARIABLE behavior.
 - FIELD_TYPE_CUMULATIVE: Cumulative/monotonic fields (e.g., accumulated_volume_m3, total_energy_kwh).
For these fields:
- MIN/MAX/AVG/SUM calculate differences between readings (consumption)
- NONE returns raw accumulated values with gap filling
 - FIELD_TYPE_VARIABLE: Variable/instantaneous fields (e.g., battery_voltage, temperature, pressure).
For these fields:
- MIN returns minimum value in time period
- MAX returns maximum value in time period  
- AVG returns average value in time period
- SUM returns sum of values (rarely useful)
- NONE returns raw values with gap filling

platformInventoryStatus.description:
Inventory status enumeration.

 - INVENTORY_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Device in inventory, Status Unknown
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_INVENTORY: Device in inventory, not yet onboarded.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_ONBOARDED: Device onboarded to platform.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_PROVISIONED: Device provisioned and active.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_DECOMMISSIONED: Device decommissioned.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_FAULTY: Device reported as faulty.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_LOST: Device lost or stolen.

platformListEnumsHelperResponse.description: Simple response for UI helper endpoint with concrete enum values.

platformLocationSource.description:
Location source enumeration - unified across all services.

 - LOCATION_SOURCE_UNKNOWN: Unknown location source.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GPS: GPS coordinates.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_MANUAL: Manually configured.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_TRIANGULATION: Calculated via triangulation.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_WIFI: WiFi-based location.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_MANUAL_OVERRIDE: Manual override.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_CONFIG: Configuration-based.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_TDOA: GEO resolver TDOA.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_RSSI: GEO resolver RSSI.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_GNSS: GEO resolver GNSS.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_WIFI: GEO resolver WiFi.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_MOBILE_GPS: GEO resolver MOBILE GPS.

platformMeterStatus.description:
- METER_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Unknown meter status.
 - METER_STATUS_ACTIVE: Active meter.
 - METER_STATUS_INACTIVE: Inactive meter.
 - METER_STATUS_REMOVED: Removed meter.

platformTimeInterval.description:
Time interval for aggregation.

 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE: 1 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE_5: 5 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE_15: 15 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE_30: 30 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_HOUR: 1 hour intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_HOUR_6: 6 hour intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_HOUR_12: 12 hour intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_DAY: 1 day intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_WEEK: 1 week intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MONTH: 1 month intervals.

platformTimeZone.description:
- TZ_PLUS_00_00: UTCÂ±0
 - TZ_UNKNOWN: Unknown timezone
 - TZ_MINUS_12_00: UTC-12 to UTC-1
 - TZ_PLUS_01_00: UTC+1 to UTC+14
platformTimeZone.title: Timezone definitions covering UTC-12 to UTC+14

platformTransportProtocol.description:
Transport protocol enumeration - unified for inventory and data services.

 - TRANSPORT_PROTOCOL_UNKNOWN: Unknown protocol.
 - TRANSPORT_LORAWAN: LoRaWAN.
 - TRANSPORT_HTTP: HTTP/HTTPS over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_MQTT: MQTT over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_TCP: TCP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_UDP: UDP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_COAP: CoAP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_WEBSOCKET: WebSocket.

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.
